message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. After considering your interest, I'm willing to offer it to you for $11500. This is a competitive price that I think you'll find hard to beat.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10750 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $11250. This is the best I can do, considering the product's value to me.
